fields.title: Valkyrie
fields.plot: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

fields.title: Ratatouille
fields.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

fields.title: City of God
fields.plot: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

fields.title: Memento
fields.plot: A man juggles searching for his wife's murderer and keeping his short-term memory loss from being an obstacle.
